text: main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ 101 ] [ 101 ] ; int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
